title.rendered: How Do I Sell My Junk Car?

content.rendered:
Got an old clunker in the garage and could use some extra cash? Let us take it off your hands! Sometimes a car becomes more of a pain than it is worth. When you bring your junk car into Aero Auto Parts, we give you cash on the spot, whether the engine runs or not.

Don’t have a junk car to sell? You can purchase junk cars from us as well. If you need a few parts, save money and time by buying them in bulk from a full parts car. Whether you need interior parts, exterior parts or both, these cars can provide all you need to get your vehicle back in working order. Perhaps you are simply looking for a new project – a junk car is perfect for your inner fixer-upper. With our wide variety of makes and models you are sure to find the perfect one for you.

Just need some extra space in the driveway? That ugly old car is just taking up precious space! Call us to schedule a pickup. That’s right, you don’t need to lift a finger (except to hand us your keys!) to get rid of your junk car. Get that weight lifted off your shoulders and some money in your pocket when selling your junk car to Aero Auto Parts!

Whether you want to sell your junk car, or buy one for a DIY project, Aero Auto Parts is here to help.

Give us a call today at (773) 483-2626.
